author: L Renganathan
text:
The number of pilgrims who have visited Kumbakonam for Mahamaham has crossed 11 lakh on the sixth day on Thursday.

On the sidelines of the Mahamaham, a grand congregation of mutt heads and ascetics commenced at Govindapuram in which hundreds of sanyasis and adheenam heads are participating.

Annadanam organisers left in the lurch as officials withdraw permission citing security risk
title: Pilgrim count crosses 11 lakh
